languages.text: "Верь во что пожелаешь, эттфатер. Всеотец не желал от нас, чтобы мы почитали его, словно божество, но мы — не обычные люди. Не знаю, каков был его замысел касательно вас".

traits.locale_text: "Верь во что пожелаешь, тан. Всеотец не желал от нас, чтобы мы почитали его, словно божество, но мы — не обычные люди. Не знаю, каков был его замысел касательно вас".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Believe what you wish, Aett-Vater. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."
languages.original_text: "Верь во что пожелаешь, эттфатер. Всеотец не желал от нас, чтобы мы почитали его, словно божество, но мы — не обычные люди. Не знаю, каков был его замысел касательно вас".

traits.locale_text: "Believe what you wish, Thegin. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Believe what you wish, Thegin. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Believe what you wish, Thegin. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Believe what you wish, Aett-Vater. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Crea lo que quiera, Aett-Vater. El Padre de todas las cosas nunca quiso que lo adoráramos como un dios, pero nosotros no somos hombres corrientes. No sé qué planes tenía para el resto de la gente».
languages.original_text: "Believe what you wish, Aett-Vater. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."

traits.locale_text: «Crea lo que quiera, Aett-Vater. El Padre de todas las cosas nunca quiso que lo adoráramos como un dios, pero nosotros no somos hombres corrientes. No sé qué planes tenía para el resto de la gente».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “你愿意怎么相信都可以，狼领。全父从不希望我们把他当作神来敬仰，不过，我们也确实不是普通人。我不知道他希望你们如何看待他。”
languages.original_text: "Believe what you wish, Aett-Vater. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."

traits.locale_text: “你愿意怎么相信都可以，狼领。全父从不希望我们把他当作神来敬仰，不过，我们也确实不是普通人。我不知道他希望你们如何看待他。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「信じたいことを信じればいいさ、アエット＝ヴァテル。全知の父は俺たちが自分を神として崇めることを決して望んでなどいなかったが、俺たちは普通の人間ではない。彼が他の者たちに対してどんな意図を持っていたのかは分からない」
languages.original_text: "Believe what you wish, Aett-Vater. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."

traits.locale_text: 「信じたいことを信じればいいさ、アエット＝ヴァテル。全知の父は俺たちが自分を神として崇めることを決して望んでなどいなかったが、俺たちは普通の人間ではない。彼が他の者たちに対してどんな意図を持っていたのかは分からない」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Grand bien vous fasse, aett-vater. Le Père de Tous n'a jamais voulu que nous le vénérions comme un dieu, mais nous ne sommes pas des hommes ordinaires. J'ignore quelles étaient ses intentions pour vous et les vôtres. »
languages.original_text: "Believe what you wish, Aett-Vater. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."

traits.locale_text: « Grand bien vous fasse, aett-vater. Le Père de Tous n'a jamais voulu que nous le vénérions comme un dieu, mais nous ne sommes pas des hommes ordinaires. J'ignore quelles étaient ses intentions pour vous et les vôtres. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Glaubt, was Ihr wollt, Aett-Vater. Der Allvater wollte nie, dass wir ihn als Gott verehren, doch wir sind keine gewöhnlichen Menschen. Ich weiß nicht, welche Absichten er für Euch andere hegt."
languages.original_text: "Believe what you wish, Aett-Vater. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt, was Ihr wollt, Aett-Vater. Der Allvater wollte nie, dass wir ihn als Gott verehren, doch wir sind keine gewöhnlichen Menschen. Ich weiß nicht, welche Absichten er für Euch andere hegt."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Believe what you wish, Aett-Vater. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."

languages.text: "Neye istersen ona inan Aett-Vater. Yücebaba hiçbir zaman ona tanrı olarak tapınmamızı istemedi. Gerçi biz sıradan insanlardan değiliz. İnsanlığın kalanı için niyeti neydi, bilemiyorum."
languages.original_text: "Believe what you wish, Aett-Vater. The Allfather never wanted us to revere him as a god, but we are not ordinary men. I do not know what his intentions were for the rest of you."

traits.locale_text: "Neye istersen ona inan Aett-Vater. Yücebaba hiçbir zaman ona bir tanrı olarak tapınmamızı istemedi ama biz sıradan insanlardan değiliz. Geri kalanlarınız için niyeti neydi bilemiyorum."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
